text: Koda River may be: *Koda River, the Japanese name of the Hutuo River (China) in the Linji school of Buddhism *Koda River (D. R. Congo), also spelled Kodda or Kodha, in Ituri province *Kōda River (Aichi), Japan; also called Kōta like the town *Kōda River (Kōchi), Japan *Koda River (Russia), a tributary of the Angara, NE of Kodinsk *Koda River (South Sudan), in Jubek State ==See also== *Koda (disambiguation)
title: Koda River
